scripts.copyAssets: cp node_modules/bulma/css/bulma.min.css public/ && cp node_modules/bulma-slider/dist/css/bulma-slider.min.css public/ && cp -a node_modules/fontawesome-free public/ && cp node_modules/requirejs/require.js public && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js public
scripts.compileAll: yarn run compileBaseSass && yarn run compileBS && yarn run compileCaDi && yarn run compileCiSo  && yarn run compileCoTra && yarn run compileGoL && yarn run compileLiRo && yarn run compileMW && yarn run compilePeSo && yarn run compileSabo && yarn run compileSnake && yarn run compileTTT && yarn run compileTTT3d && yarn run compileXmas
scripts.compileBS: tsc -p tsconfig/bs.json && sass --style compressed sass/bs.sass public/bs/style.css
scripts.compileCaDi: tsc -p tsconfig/cadi.json && sass --style compressed sass/cadi.sass public/cadi/style.css
scripts.compileCiSo: tsc -p tsconfig/ciso.json && sass --style compressed sass/ciso.sass public/ciso/style.css
scripts.compileCoTra: tsc -p tsconfig/cotra.json && sass --style compressed sass/cotra.sass public/cotra/style.css
scripts.compileGoL: tsc -p tsconfig/gol.json && sass --style compressed sass/gol.sass public/gol/style.css
scripts.compileLiRo: tsc -p tsconfig/liro.json && sass --style compressed sass/liro.sass public/liro/style.css
scripts.compileMW: tsc -p tsconfig/mw.json && sass --style compressed sass/mw.sass public/mw/style.css
scripts.compilePeSo: tsc -p tsconfig/peso.json && sass --style compressed sass/peso.sass public/peso/style.css
scripts.compileSabo: tsc -p tsconfig/sabo.json && sass --style compressed sass/sabo.sass public/sabo/style.css
scripts.compileSnake: tsc -p tsconfig/snake.json && sass --style compressed sass/snake.sass public/snake/style.css
scripts.compileTTT: tsc -p tsconfig/ttt.json && sass --style compressed sass/ttt.sass public/ttt/style.css
scripts.compileTTT3d: tsc -p tsconfig/ttt3d.json && sass --style compressed sass/ttt3d.sass public/ttt3d/style.css
scripts.compileXmas: tsc -p tsconfig/xmas.json && sass --style compressed sass/xmas.sass public/xmas/style.css
scripts.test: tsc -p tsconfig/test.json && nyc --reporter=text-summary --reporter=html mocha -r ts-node/register $NODE_DEBUG_OPTION test/**/**.test.ts
